title: The Warhammer 40,000: Darktide Closed Beta is Here | Wishlist?
description:
Support us on Patreon to get Early Access to new videos, exclusive Discord perks & more for just $2 per month ►► https://www.patreon.com/the_escapist

Welcome to Wishlist, a new stream series hosted by Frost (Sebastian Ruiz) where every week we check out game demos or early access games to determine if they're worth putting on your wishlists. This week, we're checking out Warhammer 40,000: Darktide.
